AssignClientsToSales.document: 成功分派一批代客给业务员
AssignClientsToSales.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: partners.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AssignClientsToSales
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ClientUins": [
        "1000002"
    ],
    "SalesUin": "2000002",
    "AssignClientStatus": "normal",
    "AssignActionType": "assign"
}
AssignClientsToSales.title: 成功分派一批代客给业务员

AuditApplyClient.document: 对待审核某客户，给予审核通过操作
AuditApplyClient.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: partners.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AuditApplyClient
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Note": "reason",
    "AuditResult": "accept",
    "ClientUin": "2000002"
}
AuditApplyClient.title: 审核通过某客户
